Description: A man's (?) hat; cylindrical; made of mid-brown satin silk cloth. Silver-coloured metal sequins (encircled with silver-coloured metal-wrapped thread) couched on the diagonal on top and sides. Mid-top has eight-petalled floral motif and edge of crown and base of sides have ornate passementerie trimming, also made with sequins and metal thread. Rim has red tabby silk (?) piping. Hat lined with cream, red, green and blue tabby cotton striped cloth.
Production ethnic group: Made by: Turk (?: Donations and Purchases Book Volume 8)
